title: OpenShift CLI
text:
OpenShift CLI

The oc commandlet is used to install OpenShift CLI. The instructions on how to use it can be found here.
Call devon oc «args» with the arguments described here.


ATTENTION:
Currently this feature is new and therefore experimental.
It may change in incompatible ways in the next releases until we reach a stable state.
We hope that all is working fine for you.
However, do not expect everything to work out of the box.


Table 27. Usage of devon oc






Argument(s)
Meaning




setup
install OpenShift CLI on your machine.


«args»
call oc with the specified arguments. Call oc --help for details or use oc directly as preferred."
